div.p: >>> IMPACT SEGMENT TONIGHT. AS YOU MAY KNOW THE

OUT WHAT EXACTLY HAPPENED WHEN AMBASSADOR CHRIS

LIBYA. BUT SOME DEMOCRATS BELIEVE
THAT BENGHAZI SITUATION IS BEING HIGHLIGHTED SIMPLY TO
HARM PRESIDENT OBAMA. >> I SAID TO SOMEONE
YESTERDAY THAT I WOULD NOT BE ALL THAT CONCERNED, FOR
INSTANCE, ABOUT THIS NEW BENGHAZI SELECT COMMITTEE
THAT WE JUST PUT IN PLACE. I SEEM TO REMEMBER OUR

ANALYST LAURA INGRAHAM. I WANT TO BE CAREFUL HERE.

1863 TO 1877 PERIOD OF RECONSTRUCTION.
VERY PAINFUL PERIOD IN OUR COUNTRY’S HISTORY.

THIS COMES UP AGAIN AND AGAIN.
IT EVEN CAME UP IN THE OBAMACARE CONTEXT YESTERDAY
WITH SENATOR JAY ROCKEFELLER.
IMPLYING THAT THE CRITICISM ABOUT OBAMACARE IS RACIALLY

IS THE FACT THAT MEDIAN INCOME IS FLAT LINING, IS

IS THAT DRUMMED UP? HOW ABOUT THE APPROVAL

HIGH FOR US REGARDLESS OF WHAT OUR SKIN COLOR IS
